title: Enhancement of the voltage output of droplet electricity generators using high dielectric high-entropy oxide composites
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,3580-3593
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01234H, Paper
Yanan Zhou, Yan Zeng, Jianming Wang, Xiaoyi Li, Peng Wang, Wenlong Ma, Congyu Wang, Jiawei Li, Wenyong Jiang, Dun Zhang
By doping high-entropy materials into PDMS as an intermediate layer, HP-DEG achieve high voltage output performance and excellent applications.
